articles.title: Music producer remembers moment with Whitney Houston that scared him - CNN
articles.description: Grammy Award-winning music producer Clive Davis sits down with CNN's Don Lemon to discuss singer Whitney Houston's career and "I Wanna Dance With Somebody," the new film about Houston that he produced.
